results.name: Number of ways to write n as x^2 + 2*y^2 + 2^z + 2^w, where x,y,z,w are nonnegative integers with z <= w.
comment: Clearly, a(2*n) > 0 if a(n) > 0. We note that 52603423 is the first value of n > 1 with a(n) = 0.
See also A302982 and A302983 for related things.
